content.description: At a certain company, loan agents are paid based on the number of loans they close in a day. Based on company records, the number of loans <math alttext="uppercase X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> that a randomly selected loan agent closes on a randomly selected day has the probability distribution below.
content.question: <math alttext="lowercase x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 <math alttext="the probability of lowercase x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> 0.05 0.10 0.22 0.30 0.18 0.12 0.03 At the company, the daily salary of a loan agent is $150 plus $50 per loan closed. Let <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> represent the amount of money made by a randomly selected loan agent on a randomly selected day. Which of the following statements is NOT true?

choices.label: The mean of <math alttext="uppercase X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is less than the mean of <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The standard deviation of <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is approximately $71.
The mean daily salary is greater than $350 per day.

The standard deviation of <math alttext="uppercase X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is less than the standard deviation of <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The shape of the probability distribution of <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is unimodal and roughly symmetric.

content.answer: The mean daily salary is greater than $350 per day.
